user.title: DODO Delivery
user.description: Choose how you want to provide the tracking code.

manual.title: Manual tracking code
manual.description: Paste the 8-character tracking code (or a t.idodo.group link).

entity.title: Tracking code from entity
entity.description: Select an entity whose state contains the 8-character code (or a t.idodo.group link).

error.entity_no_code: The selected entity does not contain a valid tracking code.
